ygData.subject: Re: Purchase prices for quest components
ygData.msgSnippet: I would guess that in the case of the Bard items, which with the exception of th lambent stones, are not needed by any other classes, would be free from most
ygData.messageBody:
I would guess that in the case of the Bard items, which with the exception of
th lambent stones, are not needed by any other classes, would be free from most
people. The items are not useful to anyone high enough level to kill the
associated mobs (assuming they are not bards). There are not a large enough
number of bards to create a demand. Chances are if you hang out long enough,
or make some friends of appropriate level, you can get the NODROP items for
free. (once all the high level bards that CAN kill the mobs are gone)

Kaleid
20th song
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus
--He who hopes the rest of his guild will be helping him get Lambent
armor...considering 90% of his guild is close to double his level...not that
the NoDrop pieces mean much considering i am almost broke anyway.

=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
